title: Mini-Ep 178: Z Is For Zeezer
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 178: Z Is For Zeezer
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discuss Zeezer (aka Zoomer) vs Millennial fashion trends and Doree’s cured folliculitis! Then, they hear from listeners about taking pleasure in the little things, how to best apply conditioner to short hair, and more commentary for the ...
description:
Kate and Doree discuss Zeezer (aka Zoomer) vs Millennial fashion trends and Doree’s cured folliculitis! Then, they hear from listeners about taking pleasure in the little things, how to best apply conditioner to short hair, and more commentary for the listener questioning her social orientation. Plus, they hear a rant about the woes of social media.


Click here to shop all of Forever35's Amazon recs.

To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).
